name: crush-grip
caption: Crush Grip

effect.short: Power increases against targets with more HP remaining, up to a maximum of 121 power.
effect.full: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic:regular-damage}.  Power directly relates to the target's relative remaining [HP]{mechanic:hp}, given by `1 + 120 * current HP / max HP`, to a maximum of 121.

flavorText:
The target is crushed with great force. The more HP
the target has left, the greater this moveâ€™s power.
